bio: Geezel is one stingy geezer of a Yo-criminal! He pinches pennies in any way he can, including not paying for his movie tickets.

soultimate.name: Deep Look
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Deals damage to foes at a rate of 6% every 2 seconds for 15 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to make foes' HP decrease steadily.

skill.effect: All attacks are critical when unseen by foes.
skill.name: Stealthy Strike

name: Geezel
